      • getJsonFromMap

        @NotNull
public static @NotNull org.json.JSONObject getJsonFromMap(@NotNull
                                                                   @NotNull java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)
                                                            throws org.json.JSONException
        Convert a Map of String, Object to a JSONObject for further manipulation or conversions. Embedded Maps are followed and converted.
        Parameters:
        map - - Map, keyed by String, to convert to JSONObject
        Returns:
        - JSONObject representation of the given Map
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - - thrown if there is an error encountered during the JSON conversion process.
